sentences.sContent: The red company to realize the rationalization proposals work system, process, no paper.
sentences.sContent_eng: The red company to realize the rationalization proposals work system, process, no paper.
sentences.sCn: 红光公司实现合理化建议工作的系统化、流程化、无纸化。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, the economic theorists regard the "logistics rationalization" as "the third profit source".
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, the economic theorists regard the "logistics rationalization" as "the third profit source".
sentences.sCn: 经济理论界也因此把“物流合理化”称为“第三利润源泉”。

words.tran: 理性主义者，唯理主义者
实行合理化；作辩解；合理地思考
使……合理化；使……有理化；为……找借口
